Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Institut Europlace de Finance/Louis Bachelier Research project grant (10,000 EUR). Fondi erogati per l organizzazione del primo Workshop on Modeling & Forecasting Moment Risk Premia presso ESSEC Business School – La Défense Campus Parigi (2014), ed il finanziamento di Research Visits in seno alla collaborazione con il Prof. Jeroen V.K. Rombouts, ESSEC Business School, in un progetto congiunto sullo studio e la stima dei premi al rischio intitolato The Price of Volatility Risk.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Selected and awarded by the Danish Council for Independent Research (Danish Ministry for Science, Innovation and Higher Education) the Sapere Aude award, a 500,000 DKK price as one of the most talented candidates among the recipients of a DFF-Individual postdoctoral grant (which I was granted in 2013 for a project entitled The Price of Risk and in the amount of 1,677,000 DKK). In 2013 the Danish Council for Independent Research has given 39 Sapere Aude: Research Talent awards, 4 of which in Economics and Social Sciences. The recipients of the price have been honored in 2014 by H.R.H the Crown Princess of Denmark, at the EliteForsk Conference organized by the Danish Minister for Science, Innovation and Higher Education.
